alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Columbiana; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN COLUMBIANA... CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Sparta, or 8 miles southeast of Canton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Minerva, Augusta, Malvern, Bolivar, Mineral City, Hanoverton, Dellroy, Zoar, Summitville, Mechanicstown, East Rochester, Harlem Springs, and Atwood Lake. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 90 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Ohio.
